title: Fun Mail.
description: An instant disposable email service that helps users manage spam-free communication. It allows users to generate temporary emails. The app ensures privacy and security.

title: The Vibrant Post.
description: A web application that scrapes and displays news from BBC and The New York Times. It helps users access curated news articles. The interface is minimalistic and user-friendly.

title: Form Builder.
description: A dynamic form builder that enables users to create customizable forms. It supports real-time previews and data storage. The UI is interactive and intuitive.

title: Drag & Drop Board like Asana
description: A task management board inspired by Asana with drag-and-drop functionality. Users can move tasks between different columns. It offers an easy and efficient task management experience.

title: Event Management Website.
description: An event management platform allowing users to book and manage events efficiently. It provides event details, schedules, and booking options. Designed for a smooth user experience.

title: Fashion website landing page.
description: A stylish landing page for a fashion brand. It presents products with an elegant layout. The design focuses on aesthetics and usability.

title: Basic eCommerce Store UI
description: A minimal store UI prototype for an e-commerce platform. It features basic cart functionality and product listing. Built as a learning project.

title: Myntra homepage clone.
description: A clone of Myntra's homepage replicating its layout and design. It showcases UI structuring and responsive design techniques. Built for frontend practice.

title: Google Notes Clone [UI].
description: A simple UI clone of Google Keep for note-taking. It allows users to add, edit, and delete notes. Designed for smooth and intuitive interactions.

title: Todo List.
description: A simple to-do list app for managing tasks. Users can add, complete, and remove tasks. A lightweight and efficient productivity tool.
